tp.pr2

Class CodeCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr2.Item
      • tp.pr2.CodeCard

  • public class CodeCard
extends Item
    An item that represents a code card. This item contains a code that can be employed to open and close streets. It always remains in the robot inventory after using it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CodeCard(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String code)
      Code card constructor

    • Method Summary

      The method to use a code card.

      • CodeCard

        public CodeCard(java.lang.String id,
        java.lang.String description,
        java.lang.String code)
        Code card constructor
        Parameters:
        id - Code card name
        description - Code card description
        code - Secret code stored in the code card

    • Method Detail

      • canBeUsed

        public boolean canBeUsed()
        A code card always can be used. Since the robot has the code card it never loses it
        Specified by:
        canBeUsed in class Item
        Returns:
        true because it always can be used

      • use

        public boolean use(RobotEngine r,
          Place p)
        The method to use a code card. If the robot is in a place which contains a street in the direction he is looking at, then the street is opened or closed if the street code and the card code match.
        Specified by:
        use in class Item
        Parameters:
        r - the robot engine employed to use the card.
        p - the place where the card is going to be used
        Returns:
        true If the codecard can complete the action of opening or closing a street. Otherwise it returns false.

      • getCode

        public java.lang.String getCode()
        Gets the code stored in the code card
        Returns:
        A String that represents the code
